FuncDef:
The intelligent-convergence enable command enables IS-IS intelligent convergence.
The undo intelligent-convergence enable command disables IS-IS intelligent convergence. The intelligent-convergence enable command enables IS-IS intelligent convergence. The undo intelligent-convergence enable command disables IS-IS intelligent convergence. By default, IS-IS intelligent convergence is disabled.
ExtraInfo: In a fault-triggered switching scenario where the local device receives a route from a single node, to enable IS-IS intelligent convergence, run the intelligent-convergence enable command. After this command is run, IS-IS can perform fast route convergence by using the fast convergence algorithm, thereby improving convergence performance.
